title: Advance to Boardwalk
description: If Unowned, you may buy it from the Bank, or put it up for Auction.\nIf Owned, pay the owner the normal rent due.

title: Advance to Boylston Street
description: If you pass a Pay Corner, collect your income from the Bank.

title: Advance to Broad Street
description: If Unowned, you may buy it from the Bank, or put it up for Auction.\nIf Owned, pay the owner the normal rent due.

title: Advance to Broad Street
description: If Unowned, you may buy it from the Bank, or put it up for Auction.\nIf Owned, pay the owner the normal rent due.

title: Advance to Dekalb Ave.

title: Advance to Katy Freeway
description: If Unowned, you may buy it from the Bank, or put it up for Auction.\nIf Owned, pay the owner the normal rent due.

description: If Unowned, you may buy it from the Bank, or put it up for Auction.\nIf Owned, pay the owner the normal rent due.

title: Advance to Randolph Street
description: If Unowned, you may buy it from the Bank, or put it up for Auction.\nIf Owned, pay the owner the normal rent due.

title: Advance to Randolph Street
description: If Unowned, you may buy it from the Bank, or put it up for Auction.\nIf Owned, pay the owner the normal rent due.

title: Advance to Saint Charles Place
description: If Unowned, you may buy it from the Bank, or put it up for Auction.\nIf Owned, pay the owner the normal rent due.

title: Advance to Squeeze Play
description: If you pass a Pay Corner, collect your income from the Bank.

title: Advance to Stock Exchange
description: If you pass GO, collect $200.

title: Advance to Stock Exchange
description: If you pass GO, collect $200.

title: Advance to Stock Exchange
description: If you pass GO, collect $200.

title: Advance to Stock Exchange
description: If you pass GO, collect $200.

title: Advance to Stock Exchange
description: If you pass GO, collect $200.

title: Advance to Tax Refund
description: Collect 50% of the Pool, if any. Give each player $50 for their help in doing your taxes.

title: Advance to the Nearest Railroad
description: If Unowned, you may buy it from the Bank, or put it up for Auction.\nIf Owned, pay the owner twice the rent otherwise due.

title: Advance to the Nearest Railroad
description: If Unowned, you may buy it from the Bank, or put it up for Auction.\nIf Owned, pay the owner twice the rent otherwise due.

title: Advance to the Nearest Utility
description: If Unowned, you may buy it from the Bank, or put it up for Auction.\nIf Owned, roll 2 dice and pay the owner 10 times the roll.

title: Advance to the Pay Corner
description:
Collect your income for landing there from the Bank.
On the outer track - "Payday" - $400
On the Center Track - "Go" - $200
 On the Inner Track - "Bonus" - $300

title: Advance to the Stock Exchange
description: If you pass "Pay Day" collect $300 from the Bank.

title: Advance to the Stock Exchange
description: If you pass "Pay Day" collect $300 from the Bank.

title: Advance to the Stock Exchange
description: If you pass "Pay Day" collect $300 from the Bank.

title: Advance to the Stock Exchange
description: If you pass "Pay Day" collect $300 from the Bank.

title: Advance to the Stock Exchange
description: If you pass "Pay Day" collect $300 from the Bank.

title: Advance to the Stock Exchange
description: If you pass "Pay Day" collect $300 from the Bank.

title: Advance to West Temple
description: If Unowned, you may buy it from the Bank, or put it up for Auction.\nIf Owned, pay the owner the normal rent due.

title: Advance to West Temple
description: If Unowned, you may buy it from the Bank, or put it up for Auction.\nIf Owned, pay the owner the normal rent due.

title: Always Bank on Family
description: Your cousin becomes the President of the Bank. The Bank will add $100 to your final bid in the next auction.

title: Assets Seized!
description: Surrender any one undeveloped, unmortgaged property - or any one building to the Bank. If you do not own property - go directly to jail.

title: Business Trip
description: Take one Travel Voucher from the deck.

title: Buyer's Market!
description: Move to any Unowned Outer Track property. Buy it from the Bank for 1/2 price.

title: Caught Insider Trading!
description: Pay the Pool a fine equal to the dividends on all the stock you hold - AND - Go directly to jail.\nIf you do not own any stock - you do not go to jail.

title: Changing Lanes
description: Move directly to the space that is 1 Track below this one. If you are on the Outer Track, do nothing.

title: Changing Lanes
description: Move directly to the space that is 1 Track below this one. If you are on the Outer Track, do nothing.

title: Changing Lanes
description: Move directly to the space that is 1 Track above this one. If you are on the Inner Track, do nothing.

title: Changing Lanes
description: Move directly to the space that is 1 Track above this one. If you are on the Inner Track, do nothing.

title: Comped Room
description: The next time you land on anyone else's property, you are excused from paying rent.

title: Electric Car A Success!
description: Shareholders who own both American Motors and National Utilities immediately collect double dividends on these stocks. If a player also owns the Electric Company, that player collects triple dividends.

title: Electric Car Shocking Success!
description: Stockholders in Acme Motors and National Utilities can immediately collect dividends. Owner of Electric Company collects TRIPLE dividends!

title: Electric Streetlights Installed On Every Block!
description: Stockholders in National Utilities can immediately collect dividends.

title: Entertainment Rocks!
description: Stockholders in Motion Pictures and General Radio can immediately collect dividends.

title: Entertainment Stocks Rocket!
description: Stockholders in Motion Pictures and General Radio can immediately collect dividends.

title: Excellent Accounting
description: Advance to Tax Refund. Collect ALL of the Pool.

title: Foreclosed Property Sale!
description: Foreclose on any opponent's mortgaged property. Pay the mortgage value to the bank to claim the property.

title: Forward Thinker
description: Advance forward 3 spaces.

title: Gain Interest from Savings
description: Collect $50 from the Bank.

title: Garbage Day
description: Advance to Trash Collector. If owned, roll 2 dice and pay the owner 10x the roll. If unowned, you may buy it, or put it up for auction. If you pass a Pay Corner, collect your income.

title: Get Rollin'
description: Advance to Roll 3!\nRoll the dice.

title: Get Taken for a Ride
description: Cabbie takes the scenic route. Go directly to the nearest Cab Company. If owned pay double rent. If unowned, do nothing. (You cannot purchase or auction the property.)

title: Go To Jail!
description: Go directly to jail.\nDo not pass any Pay Corner.\nDo not collect any money.

title: GPS is not working
description: Stop and ask for directions.\nAllow the player to your left to move your token directly to any space on the board, their choice.

title: HEY! TAXI!!! *whistle*
description: Advance to Black & White Cab Co.\nIf Unowned, you may buy it from the Bank, or put it up for Auction.\nIf Owned, pay the owner the normal rent due.

title: Holiday Bonus!
description: Collect $100 from the Bank.

title: Hurricane makes landfall!
description: Remove 1 House from each property in any player's 1 color group. (Downgrade Skyscrapers to Hotels; Hotels to 4 houses.)

title: Just Say "NO"!
description: Play at any time to stop another player's actions against you.

title: Just Say "NO"!
description: Play at any time to stop another player's actions against you.

title: Just Say "NO"!
description: Play at any time to stop another player's actions against you.

title: Just Say "NO"!
description: Play at any time to stop another player's actions against you.

title: Just Say "NO"!
description: Play at any time to stop another player's actions against you.

title: Loan Matures!
description: Collect $150 from the Bank.

title: Make General Repairs to all your properties.
description: $25 per House, Cab Stand, and Transit Station\n$100 per Hotel and Skyscraper

title: Mardi Gras!
description: Everyone has to see the parade of Rex,  King of Carnival.\nAll players must move directly to Canal Street.

title: New Fitness Craze
description: The latest trend in exercise is here. Pay each player $25 for lessons and equipment.

title: Occupy Wall Street
description: If Unowned, you may buy it from the Bank, or put it up for Auction.\nIf Owned, pay the owner the normal rent due.

title: Party Time
description: You hold a Party to impress community leaders.\n Pay $25 to the Pool.

title: Pay Back!
description: Go directly to jail for illegal business practices. While in jail, you may not collect rent. All rent due to you goes to the Pool.

title: Property Taxes
description: Pay $25 to the Pool for each unmortgaged property you own.

title: Ride on the Reading
description: If Unowned, you may buy it from the Bank, or put it up for Auction.\nIf Owned, pay the owner the normal rent due.

title: Ride the Subway
description: Move directly to the Subway space. On your next turn, move to any space on the board.

title: School Fees
description: Pay the pool $150.

title: See You In Court!
description: Sue any player for unfair business practices. Take $250 from any player of your choice.

title: Shouldn't the Train be here already?
description: If you own any railroads or United Railways stock, pay each player $50 as a refund for poor service.

title: Slick Move
description: Steal a property card from a player of your choice. It can't be part of a monopoly.

title: Social Media Fail!
description: Someone posting to your company's official online presence made you look bad. Pay each other player $50 to restore good PR.

title: Stock Market Crash!
description: All stockholders turn in 1/2 of their shares (rounded up) in EACH company to the bank. These shares can be repurchased later.

title: Stock Market Crash!
description: All Stockholders turn in 1/2 (rounded up) of all of their stocks for each company to the bank.\n(They may be repurchased later)

title: Strong-armed Deal
description: Swap a property card with a player of your choice. It can't be part of a monopoly.

title: Taxi Wars are not Fare!
description: Take any 1 Cab Company from any player. If none are owned, purchase your choice from the bank. Advance to that space. If you pass a Pay Corner, collect your income.

title: Traffic Ticket!
description: Pay the Pool $15.

title: Travel Is All The Rage!
description: Stockholders in United Railways, American Motors, and Allied Steamships can immediately collect dividends.

title: Travel Is All The Rage!
description: Stockholders in United Railways, Acme Motors, and Allied Steamships can immediately collect dividends.

title: Video Killed the Radio Star!
description: Dividends for General Radio are 1/2 (rounded up to the nearest dollar) for all stockholders for the next 2 payouts.

title: Video Killed the Radio Star.
description: Dividends for General Radio are half to all players for the next 2 payouts rounded to the next highest whole dollar amount.

title: Win the Marathon!
description: Take a victory lap around the board (on your current Track) and collect the Pay Corner income from the Bank.

title: You Are Caught At Insider Trading!
description: Pay the bank a fine equal to the dividends on all the stock you hold AND Go To Jail. If you do not own any stock, you do not Go To Jail.

title: You are elected as the Chairperson
description: Pay each player $50

title: Zero Dollars Down!
description: Build 1 FREE house on any property in a monopoly you own.
